refbody.section: PurposeDisplay the server keys used by the SSH server of the appliance.

ExampleDisplay SSH keys of the server.Console> sshkey fingerprint SSH RSA Key fingerprint 10:c6:c6:5c:44:72:d1:e9:84:15:df:65:47:96:1a:c1 SSH DSA Key fingerprint cd:a9:8e:a8:0b:d0:45:ce:ac:9e:67:92:06:cf:63:1b Console>
Information for consumers onlyThis command is a hidden command, meant for internal use only. It generally should not be revealed to end customers.
